node.title: Three more people charged over death of man dropped off at Auckland medical centre
node.description: The three arrests come after a 23-year-old woman was charged with murder on Monday.
node.content: ["A further three people have been charged in relation to the death of a man who was left at a Takanini medical centre last month.\u00a0\u00a0", "Police said two males, aged 33 and 36, and a 48-year-old female were arrested on Wednesday over the death of 22-year-old Rangiwhero Toia Ngaronoa, from Gisborne.", "Counties Manukau Police said all three have been charged with conspiracy to injure with intent.", "The 33-year-old male is also charged with accessory after the fact to murder, while the second male has also been charged with attempts to pervert the course of justice.", "Police said all three people are due to appear in the Manukau District Court on Wednesday.\u00a0", "The three arrests come after a 23-year-old woman was charged with murder on Monday.", "Ngaronoa was critically injured when he was dropped at the centre on November 21. He was subsequently taken to Middlemore Hospital and died soon after.", "Police said that the investigation remains ongoing and they can't rule out further arrests being made.", "No further comment could be made as the matter was before the court, police said."]
